innerHTML:
A wonderful package arrived on my desk this morning!

It contained the CSS Awwwards book from The CSS Awards* honouring the best CSS Websites of 2010 - that’s a lot of CSS!

I’m Mr July 9. It makes me happy but humbled, especially sat next to The Mid-Century Modernist - a site far more worthy of such an accolade.

I also learned today that I’m Australian! I had no idea, my home page says I’m from the UK. Oh well guess I can’t complain, I will learn to embrace my new heritage.

Better photos to come when I have more than my iPhone at hand.

* one of the more rigorously curated web design galleries out there.

pageTitle: G’Day Mate! – David Bushell – Web Design (UK)
